title: Heavy sans
content:
Hello all

Any ideas on this one? Any help greatly appreciated. (from the slightly clunky looking C, I’m thinking this could be hand drawn)

thanks

Tom

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080220040953im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/samp_5230.jpg)

 [‹ Ornament](http://web.archive.org/web/20080220040953/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41847 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) San-Serif Freeway lookalike - client brand ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080220040953/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41837 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tomdarra

comments.content:
Where did you get the sample?  
It could be hand-drawn, or it could be an old irregular, forgotten, metal face of that kind.

Hi there

Its from the cover of a Mario Testino “Disciples” exhibition catalogue (London 2003) designed by Peter B Willberg. Came across it the other day and was rather intrigued.
